hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #4# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Fire Medallion#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Fire Medallion#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #the Lens of Truth#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Huge Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZF (Jabu).text: This hint is in another castle.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Ruto's Letter#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #2# major items.
